p: The foremost aim of oncologic agents is to precisely target cancerous cells with minimal effects on non-malignant cells. T. bentzoÃ« crude extract had a selective index value of approximately 2.5, indicating that the extract had some degree of selectivity towards HepG2 cells as opposed to non-malignant human ovarian epithelial cells. Nevertheless, it is crucial to also assess the cytotoxicity of the extract against a panel of normal cells of different tissue origins, to provide greater insight regarding its toxicity window and safety profile.
